manpage.name: dbpager
manpage.summary: the command line dbPager programming language interpretator.

description.p: The dbPager Server is a multifunctional, cross-platform, open source application server, containing own XML-based script language interpretator. The script language is simply and understood well; it contains facilities to access external data such as databases, web-pages, text files and data in XML format plus powerful data processing facilities.
dbPager Server package includes the documentation (User's Guide) in HTML format, available at /usr/share/doc/dbpager. Refer to that manual for details in configuration file options.
Visit the web site at http://dbpager.org.ru for more information, downloads and community support resources.

options.option: uses an alternate configuration file, specified by name.
initializes one or more parameters with values.
specifies the file to execute by path or URL.
